Package model

Class MaximaSuperior

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MaximaSuperior
  • public class MaximaSuperior
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the bussines-logic of the problem to be tackled; this is the controller class that provides all the functionalities to be used in the ui package. In the problem tackled, this class contains the array of archangels and the methods for navigating through it.

    • Method Detail

      • nameAlreadyExists

        public boolean nameAlreadyExists​(java.lang.String name)
        Answers if the passed name is already registered for another Archangel in this legion.
        Parameters:
        name - String, could be null or empty.
        Returns:
        true if name was found, otherwise false.

      • nameIsValid

        public boolean nameIsValid​(java.lang.String name)
        Answers if the name requested meet the conditions to being added. post: after doing the validation, the message of reports will be updated with the results of this procedure.
        Parameters:
        name - String, could be empty, but CANNOT be null.
        Returns:
        true if name ends with "el" and hasn't been registered yet. Otherwise, return false.

      • powersAreValid

        public boolean powersAreValid​(java.lang.String[] powers)
        Validates if the requested powers meet the conditions to being added. post: after doing the validation, the message of reports will be updated with the results of this procedure.
        Parameters:
        powers - String[], array of powers to validate.
        Returns:
        true if NONE of the powers exists already, otherwise returns false.

      • date2String

        public java.lang.String date2String​(int day,
                                    int month)
        Converts a number day and month into its equivalent in words. pre: day and month should be coherent, i.e. should correspond to each other. Example: if month is 2 (february), day CANNOT be greater than 29; otherwise, an error will occur.
        Parameters:
        day - integer. CANNOT BE greater than 31 or less than 1.
        month - integer. CANNOT BE grater than 12, or less than 1.
        Returns:
        the String month plus the number day. e.g. "january 12".

      • dateIsValid

        public boolean dateIsValid​(int celebration_day,
                           int celebration_month)
        Validates if the date requested meets the conditions to be added. pre:
        Parameters:
        celebration_day - integer, CANNOT BE NULL.
        celebration_month - integer, CANNOT BE NULL.
        Returns:
        true if the celebration_day is coherent with the celebration_month and viceversa. Otherwise, returns false.

      • registrationIsAllowed

        public boolean registrationIsAllowed​(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String[] powers,
                                     int celebration_day,
                                     int celebration_month)
        Answers if the desired attributes of a potential new Archangel are valid.
        Parameters:
        name - String, name of the potential new Archangel to be added.
        powers - String[], list of the potential new Archangel to be added.
        celebration_day - integer, number of the day of celebration of the potential new Archangel to be added.
        celebration_month - integer, number of the month of celebration of the potential new Archangel to be added.
        Returns:
        true if the attributes of the potential new Archangel meets the conditions to be added. Otherwise, returns false.

      • addArchangel

        public void addArchangel​(int position,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String[] powers,
                         java.lang.String prayer,
                         int celeb_day,
                         int celeb_month,
                         java.lang.String color,
                         java.lang.String size,
                         java.lang.String essence,
                         double brightness_degree)
        Add a new Archangel to the list of Archangels of this legion. pre: ALL the attributes passed as parameters meets the conditions to be added and the array of Archangel has at least one position available. post: a new Archangel with the attributes passed as parameters will be added in the position specified.
        Parameters:
        position - integer, is a position available in the array of Archangels. CANNOT BE negative.
        name - String, name of the Archangel to be added.
        powers - String[], list of powers of the Archangel to be added.
        prayer - String, prayer of the Archangel to be added.
        celeb_day - int, number of the month of celebration of the Archangel to be added.
        celeb_month - int, number of the day of celebration of the Archangel to be added.
        color - String, color of the candle to the Archangel to be added.
        size - String, size of the candle assigned to the Archangel to be added.
        essence - Stirng, essence of the candle assigned to the Archangel to be added.
        brightness_degree - double, brightness degree of the candle assigned to the Archangel to be added.

      • numOfAvailablePositions

        public int numOfAvailablePositions()
        Answers how many positions for archangels are available in this legion.
        Returns:
        the number of avaialable positions in the array of Archangel of this legion.

      • countArchangels

        public int countArchangels()
        Answers how many archangels are registered. pre: the positions in the array of archangels are NULL if none archangel has been registered in it.
        Returns:
        the number of Archangels registered.

      • searchByPowers

        public Archangel searchByPowers​(java.lang.String[] powers)
        Iterates over every Archangel and then search if has any of the powers passed as parameter. If find an archangel whose list of powers include any of the powers passed as parameter, returns it.
        Parameters:
        powers - String[] powers to search by.
        Returns:
        Archangel if any of the powers passed match with any of its powers. Otherwise, returns null.

      • searchCelebsByMonth

        public java.lang.String searchCelebsByMonth​(int month)
        Iterates through the array of archangels of this legion; if finds an Archangel whose celebration month matches with the passed as paramter, returns it.
        Parameters:
        month - int, number of the celebration month of the archangel searched.
        Returns:
        Archangel that matches the celebration month passed through parameter if any. Otherwise returns null.

      • showAllCelebs

        public java.lang.String showAllCelebs()
        Sends a message containing all the archangel's celebrations and name. post: message will be updated containing the response of this operation.

      • searchIdxByName

        public int searchIdxByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Iterates through the array of archangels of this legion; if finds an Archangel that matches the name requested, returns it.
        Parameters:
        name - String, name of the archangel searched.
        Returns:
        position of the Archangel that matches the name passed through parameter if any. Otherwise returns null.
